resources.string: In recognition of Dr. Uhazy\â€™s lifelong commitment to student success; to the thirst for continued improvement and learning; to selfless service to the college and community; and to not accepting anything less than excellence mark him as a consummate professional whose life example sets a standard for all to seek. Uhazy has been at the college more than 29 years. Before becoming a dean in 1998, he taught microbiology. He holds a bachelor\'s and master\'s degrees from the University of Alberta and a doctorate at the University of Guelph.
